column5: As the title says, anyone coming down, passing through or anything like that from Sudbury down to the Richmond Hill/Toronto area any time soon?  I'm trying to purchase an Otter Ice Fishing Shelter and them damn yanks won't ship it to me (no offence to our Southern Contingent   )  Closest place I've found that has it in stock is in Sudbury.  Not sure if it would cost me more in gas both ways or to have it shipped  A pick up truck or van would be needed as the guy says the sled part of it is 6'6"  I will pay your gas one way if you are already planning on coming down this way anyhow  Thanks and PM me if you want.  Joey
P.M. sent I can't help you but I decided to take you up on your offer.   Art
Wonder how that would look ratchet strapped down to the roof of our son's gf's toyota?? She drives back and forth to University each weekend! (and NO.. I'm not letting her use my truck!)
Joey, try this place and you have a PM. http://www.riversideoutdoors.ca/catalog/
Gee Thanks Wayne  Thanks Fisherman, replied to PM!
Sorry Joey.. she's rode off two cars in the last 4 years, I'm not giving her my truck!
Uh oh, taught her how to drive eh Wayne  I may have it worked out now thanks to Spincast
LOL.. Rick's a good lad in logistics, I'm sure he has an "angle" on it!
Here are links to places in Buffalo where you have stuff shipped to and then you drive to pick it up. Michael   http://shiptotheborder.com/bay-brokerage-buffalo-new-york  http://www.cbiusa.com/
